    • findNearestNest

      public WolfNest findNearestNest()
      Finds the nearest nest within the wolf's vision range.
      Overrides:
      findNearestNest in class Animal
      Returns:
      the nearest nest object, or null if none are found

    • moveToOrDigHole

      public void moveToOrDigHole()
      Moves the wolf toward the nearest nest using moveTowards() if one exists. If no nest is nearby, the wolf digs a new nest.
      Overrides:
      moveToOrDigHole in class Animal
      Parameters:
      world - the world in which the animal is located

    • digHole

      public void digHole()
      Digs a new AnimalNest at the wolfs location in the world. This method sets the wolf's `WolfNest` attribute to the new hole.
      Overrides:
      digHole in class Animal
